GameData.Language_en_US:
Greetings, what do you need from the Yama?
Welcome back, it is an honor to have you here.
I have my eyes on you. You need to learn a lot more from my lectures.
Your mobilization of soldiers worries me. I hope you are not planning an invasion. -
Your expansion of cities is a serious problem to the other civilizations. They all need land, so I expect you to share it with them.
-
... -
Are you trying my patience? -
I thought I said no, or was I not clear enough? -
Even the Yama has a limit to her patience. -
Greetings. -
Welcome back. -
I am watching you. -
Have you learned anything yet from my lectures?
-
We meet again. I am honored to have you here. -
Salutations. I see that you have been learning well from my lectures. -
Greetings. Many leaders should learn more from you. What do you need? -
Welcome back. Have you come to hear some more of my lectures? -
Welcome. Have you been keeping up with your duties? -
What brings you to my court today? -
You need to learn from your mistakes more often. -
Your sins are great. At this rate, if I were to judge you, you shall be sent to Hell. -
It is you again. I see that you have not been learning from my lectures. Shall I lecture you again? -
You prove to be a lot more troublesome than I thought. -
Hmph. Even I am not strong enough to punish you. -
I believe it is time to lay down our arms. -
This war is going nowhere. It is better for us to make peace right now. -
There is no point in continuing this war. -
You shall repent and undo your mistakes! -
Prepare for your judgement day! -
I have nothing to say to you. -
Your sin of deception and dishonor is written all over you. Have you come here to repent? -
Greetings, my friend. -
{1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} needs to be punished. -
{1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} has a lot to learn. -
We shall deliver justice to {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}. -
{1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}'s punishment will not be light, I assure you. -
Why are you here? You should be on the fields commanding your troops. -
I hope you will be able to resolve your conflict rightfully. What do you need? -
You are not planning an invasion against me, are you? -
Your soldiers should stay away from my borders. We do not feel safe with them around. -
Have you come to hear a lecture of mine about your troublesome greed? -
You should be sharing land with all the other civilizations. You are not the only leader in this world. -
Have you come to hear a lecture of mine about your troublesome greed? -
Your land growth is too much for your citizens, other civilizations need it too for their citizens. -
Your civilization is known for its strong military. Let us wipe the evils of this world together. -
Your civilization is known for its strong economy. Do you have the heart to donate some money to those of less fortune? -
You need to be settling new cities. You cities are getting way too crowded for your citizens. My advice to you is this: Build more settlers and settle new lands. This is the good deed you can do right now. -
Your army is way too small for your civilization. Barbarians and bandits could overrun you at this rate if you do not do anything. My advice to you is this: You should build more troops to protect your lands. This is the good deed you can do right now. -
Your warmongering is a problem for the world. I hope you will learn to stop your bloodlust soon enough. I need to lecture you on this. You must stop your conquest at once! This is the good deed you can do right now. -
Have you finally learned your lesson? -
Have you been studying well on how to be a good leader? -
What do you want? -
{1_PlayerName} is not to be trusted. You should watch your back. -
Your relationship with {1_PlayerName} pleases me. You can learn a lot from their actions. -
I will have you know that {1_PlayerName} deserves every bit of respect from the world. I believe the world could learn many great things from this person. -
I assure you, your judgement of {1_PlayerName} is very accurate. I am pleased to know that you know what is wrong and evil. -
I am sorry. I have not judged you properly enough. -
My judgement of you is not clear yet. I need time to evaluate my judgements. -
{1_CivName} is a menace to the world. I need your help to approve of my judgement by denouncing them. -
I need help in punishing {1_CivName}. They must not escape from their guilts, and I need your help in making them change their actions. (WILL DECLARE WAR IMMEDIATELY) -
A leader should never betray anyone, including other leaders. The world must know that you are a horrible example of a leader![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
You have a lot to learn from your actions. I hope my judgement to you will make you learn that betrayal is a great sin![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
It seems that calling you a friend of the world was a mistake of mine. For that, I am to be blamed. However, it is not too late to announce that I was wrong, and you are not a good example to be followed![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
{1_CivName} is trustable, I assure you. You can learn many things from them. I believe they are a good example for the world. -
I will have you know that {1_CivName} is not to be trusted. You need to be careful around them, and do not do what they did wrong. -
Your judgement on {1_CivName} is very much wrong, I assure you. Perhaps you could even learn things from them. -
Your judgement on {1_CivName} is very accurate. I shall give my approval on your denouncement. -
You're allies with {1_CivName}? Me too! We should plan some kind of party. -
I agree with your judgement on {1_CivName}. Our denouncement shall make them learn. -
{1_CivName} is not a good example to be followed. I would not be allies with them for too long if I were you. -
Between you and {1_PlayerName}, I believe {1_PlayerName} is the better example of a good leader. You need to learn a lot from {1_PlayerName}.
-
I think you should be sharing those lands with the other civilizations. It will help make the world more balanced. -
I will not take your broken promise so lightly! -
I expect you to stop your excessive plot buying so that other leaders could use them as well. -
I believe you should be sharing those plots of land with the other civilizations. They also need some for the growth of their civilization. -
I will not take your broken promise so lightly! -
Your city state ally have been learning from the wrong leader. It is my job to make sure that they learn from the right leader. Therefore, I have launched an invasion against them. -
Reports say that we have launched an attack on your city state ally. We will resolve this problem quickly, I assure you. -
You are clearly a worthy leader to be respected and honored. The world shall know that you are a great example of a leader. -
Let us declare our friendship to the world so that they know who to learn from. You clearly are a great example of a leader. -
I shall hand down my judgement of you. Your sins are not to be followed by the world. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
I shall hand down my judgement of you. You are clearly a sinful leader. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
I tried to hold back my wrath, but your continued sins have tried my patience for too long. I may no longer sit back and watch you tear down the harmony of this world! -
You are now on my list of individuals to be lectured heavily. -
You clearly are worth to be honored and respected by the world.
-
You have not been learning well from my lectures, I see. The way you lead your civilization is an insult to the very name of civilization itself! -
You should consider retiring before the world rises up against you. The way you lead your civilization is unacceptable for a great leader. You need to learn more from my lectures. -
Your methods of leading and representing your people is unacceptable by my standards as the Yama. You need to come to visit me more often, I shall lecture you on how to be a good leader. Perhaps I should come visit you instead, knowing that you probably will not visit me any time soon. -
I have heard many cases that travellers around your border have been attacked by bandits and barbarians alike. Unfortunately, most of these travellers end up here in my court, having been murdered while they were robbed. You need to build a stronger military force, your borders are not safe. This is the good deed you can do right now. I do not want to have to judge any more of these innocent travellers! -
I have weapons of mass destuction. I hope I do not have to use it against you. So long as you learn from my lectures and be a good leader, then these would definitely not be used. -
Your bullying of minors is intolerable! Your position as a leader is gifted from the gods. Do not ever abuse them for your own needs! You must cease your actions at once! This is the good deed you can do right now. -
Evidence show that suicide rates in your civilization have increased drastically these past few years. Most of the souls that have arrived here because of suicide are from your cities. As the Yama, unfortunately, I have to send them to Hell without further questions. Such is the sad fact of being a Yama, forced to send people who are innocent in their deeds yet finally committed the sin of suicide, because of a horrible leader they have! I want you to learn more from my lectures! You should treat your people better. This is the good deed you can do right now. -
You have not been settling new lands. Your people need to explore the world more, so I suggest you should build more cities in faraway lands. This is the good deed you can do right now. -
Your cities are rather deserted. You will need more people to be more productive. You should improve the healthcare facilities of your civilization. This is the good deed you can do right now. -
Without the flourishing of arts in a civilization, they are no different than barbarians, who live only to destroy and plunder, committing the age old sins of humanity. You should not go into that road, or else I would have to judge more people to Hell. You need to teach your people the wonders of art and culture. This is the good deed you can do right now. It would help you develop a sense of pride in one's country, and to differentiate you from barbarians.
You do not have to worry. I will not be settling new cities. Higan is where we belong. -
The way you said that was inappropriate from a leader. However, you should not have to worry, we will not be settling new cities anytime soon. -
Very well. May this be a sign to the world that your leadership is to be admired. -
I am afraid I cannot do that. -
I am sorry, I must refuse the offer. -
Yes, I shall come along with you. By our combined might, they shall be punished. -
Yes, I shall come along with you. However, give me ten turns to prepare.
-
... -
Let us lay down our arms. Hopefully this offer should be enough to do that. -
I do not want to have to continue this war. I hope this offer is enough to end it. -
Tribute these and your sins shall be weighed lighter. -
I do not like to have to request these from other leaders. However, the ministry needs it to keep Higan alive. -
Asking for gifts is inappropriate of me as the Yama. However, I am in dire need of these. -
Forgive my rudeness, but would you please lend us a hand by giving us these? -
Take these, I am sure it would help you right now. -
This should help fix some of the problems you are facing right now. -
I feel that a Research Agreement is necessary for the world to advance. Would you like to sign one with me?
-
Your sentence will be lighter, I assure you. -
Very well, I hope you learned your lesson. -
Your apology is accepted. -
I am sorry, I will need more from you. -
That is unacceptable. The trade must be properly balanced. -
Are you insulting me with this kind of offer? Both sides do not look equal at all! -
Unacceptable! This is an insult to the very name of trading!
-
You have made a crucial mistake. I shall make you cleanse your sins, even if I have to hurt you! -
It seems that my last punishment for you was not good enough to make you learn. Very well, I shall increase the severity of your sentence! -
Even in the face of defeat, I must uphold my convictions as the Yama to make you change your ways! -
The flowers of Higan are withering. Although that may signify my end as the Yama, I must continue upholding my duties until the last flower turns to dust! -
You have made a terrible mistake. Have you not learned from your mistakes yet? -
This was a foolish decision. I shall make you learn to be a proper leader. I must not allow your foolish ways to continue bringing your people to their demise! -
I had been planning to punish you soon. It looks like I will have to take action now. -
It looks like I have judged you accurately. I had been preparing for this. -
My time to punish you has come. It will not be a light one. -
Like a flower that struggles to survive in the desert, I shall never let go of my convictions as the Yama. Even at a severe disadvantage, I will make sure that you will never sin again! -
This time, I will make sure that you will never sin again! -
I have misjudged you. My expectations of you were too high. You are not the kind of leader that I had hoped for. -
My judgements of you were incorrect. It seems that even you can be influenced by the sins of mankind. -
I do not take betrayals lightly. I will make sure that you learn from this mistake.
-
In the purple cherry blossoms resides humans neck-deep in sin. Under these raining purple cherry blossoms, by my will as the Yama, you shall cleanse your sins! -
Hell exists not to punish sinners, but to ensure that nobody sins in the first place. I am here so that everybody realizes that. Even if I must hurt you, I must make you correct the error of your ways! -
The weight of your sins have grown to become a matter of importance. You will be sent to Hell when you are dead. As the Yama, I am here to correct your ways! -
Your dishonorable ways must be changed. I am here as the Yama to make sure that you will never commit that sin ever again! -
Your greed for land has grown too problematic for the world. I am here to make you change your ways, even if I must hurt you! -
The world has grown too sinful. I shall be the one who brings light into this dark world, starting from you! -
This dark world needs light. I will be the one who carries to light of the gods into this world. I will make sure this light is brought to your civilization! -
This is my time to punish you for your sins. I cannot let this opportunity pass by! -
Even in the worst times, one must always show courage in the face of death. Likewise, I shall punish you, even when I am at a disadvantage! -
I cannot trust you any longer. Even if I will be known as a betrayer, I need to announce to the world that you are worth punishing! -
I had trusted you for a long time. I believed you were a great leader, but it looks like even you can fall into the vices of mankind. I need to stop these acts of sin of yours, before it is too late! -
I gave you a chance to pay tribute for your sins, but you did not take my offer. The time for your punishment has come.
-
You have not served your sentence yet. -
There can be no peace today. You have not learned anything yet. -
Unacceptable. You cannot avoid your punishment.
-
I do not take theft lightly. This incident will be remembered. -
You are trying my patience! I ask that you never do that again, or else we will have problems in the future. -
My judgement of you was correct. Your punishment will not be light. -
I got my eyes on you. -
Very well. By my will as the Yama, you shall cleanse your sins! -
I hope that is the case. -
It is clear that you do not understand how much of your sins have affected your minors. -
Good. I hope that you too, will learn from your mistakes. -
I am sure that what I did was for the greater good. -
That is dissapointing. I hope that you will soon realize the mistake that you have done. -
Good. I hope that you do not repeat this action in the future. It is good to see that you have been learning well from my lectures. -
Good. I hope that you do not repeat this action in the future. It is good to see that you have been learning well from my lectures. -
Good. I hope that you do not repeat this action in the future. It is good to see that you have been learning well from my lectures. -
Good. I hope that you do not repeat this action in the future. It is good to see that you have been learning well from my lectures. -
Good. I hope that you do not repeat this action in the future. It is good to see that you have been learning well from my lectures. -
Good. I hope that you do not repeat this action in the future. It is good to see that you have been learning well from my lectures. -
Our words are backed with nuclear weapons. I do not wish to use any of these against anyone. But I will not hesitate to use these to punish the wicked, should the time come!
-
Your spy stole a technology from us. Will not take theft lightly. I ask that you stop sending your agents, or your punishment will be severe. -
We have caught your spy stealing our technology. I ask that you do not send any more of your agents into our territory. -
Good. I hope that you do not repeat this action in the future. It is good to see that you have been learning well from my lectures. -
Very well, it is a shame that I cannot persuade you to stop. Perhaps I should be more insightful in my lectures. -
I caught your spy trying to steal my technology and I have properly executed the thief. Let this be a lesson to the other spies. -
I humbly apologize for the misunderstanding my agent has brought upon you. This shall be a lesson for us for the better future. Are you willing to forgive us? -
Oh, this is gonna be about that whole spying thing, isn't it? -
We have found evidence of a spy amidst us. I suspect that it is one of yours. Until more evidence comes up however, I shall refrain from pointing fingers at anyone. If you truly are innocent, then you have nothing to worry about. -
May this be a lesson for me to learn to never do this again. -
I thank you kindly for forgiving me. -
Very well, but I hope that your people know the difference between Black and White. -
I am afraid I cannot do that. Your people need to learn about the virtues of the world. As the Yama, I must bring everyone to the path of Enlightenment. -
I am willing to accept your surrender. I do not wish to continue fighting this one sided war. -
I will accept your offer to surrender. I hope that you are willing to consider this option. I do not wish to harm more innocent people.
-
You will have to do more than this if you want to be truly called the protector of city states. -
In times like these, you choose to revoke your pledge. Such a shame. -
I am pleased to hear this. I hope that you do not do this anymore in the future, or else we will have further problems.
I demand that your Archaelogists refrain from digging up our property! The punishment for theft is harsh in Hell, and it is better that you stop now before it is too late!
I am afraid I cannot do that. I need these artifacts to examine your culture to better understand them, so that I can judge you better.
As you request, we shall refrain from digging up your artifacts.
Very well, it is a shame that I cannot persuade you to stop. Perhaps I should be more insightful in my lectures.
Good. I hope that this could be a great lesson for all of your people to learn from.
I am glad that you have switched to our ideology, Freedom. You will learn many valuable things from following our ideology, I assure you.
I am glad that you have switched to our ideology, Order. You will learn many valuable things from following our ideology, I assure you.
I am glad that you have switched to our ideology, Autocracy. You will learn many valuable things from following our ideology, I assure you.
Our court system has been adjusted to follow your court's model. I hope that this does not ruin my duties as the Yama, for I fear that I might no longer be able to judge properly with your system in place.
It is good to see that you are following our culture. May you learn well from us. I shall appoint a special lecture session every week for your people to listen well to.
